messages.message:
Hey Team,

Also had a quick question regarding that call:

David was demoing the Converse use case and showed a time you might use the Research Mode toggle. Seeing as when the customer uses Research mode, it expends more tokens than general querying, do we have an enablement doc that outlines the types of questions a customer might need to turn Research mode on for vs when they can leave it off?

My thinking is the customer can use it as a guideline for phrasing and level of reasoning required so they can get the most amount of value as possible.

cc @david.lee @Sanch

We have a tool tip on the research mode label to describe this feature. This does not talk about the cost.

In the docs we have captured lot more details, https://docs.instabase.com/chat/converse#models-and-research-mode

https://docs.instabase.com/overview/models/

https://docs.instabase.com/policies/pricing-policy
